languages.text: "Это предварительные мероприятия по подготовке к допросу — подозреваемого всегда лучше пару раз обработать дубинкой, чтобы обеспечить сговорчивость. Стандартная процедура".

"Those are merely the preliminary measures before the interrogation begins in earnest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A suspect becomes more inclined to speak if you give them the baton first. Standard procedure."
languages.original_text: "Это предварительные мероприятия по подготовке к допросу — подозреваемого всегда лучше пару раз обработать дубинкой, чтобы обеспечить сговорчивость. Стандартная процедура".

traits.locale_text: "Those are merely the preliminary procedures before the interrogation begins in earnest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A suspect becomes more inclined to speak if you give them the baton first. Standard procedure."

"Those are merely the preliminary measures before the interrogation begins in earnest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A suspect becomes more inclined to speak if you give them the baton first. Standard procedure."

languages.text: « Ce ne sont là que les mesures préliminaires à l'interrogatoire en tant que tel, Votre Seigneurie. Un suspect est bien plus enclin à parler lorsqu'on prépare le terrain à coups de matraque. Nous ne faisons que suivre la procédure habituelle. »
languages.original_text: "Those are merely the preliminary measures before the interrogation begins in earnest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A suspect becomes more inclined to speak if you give them the baton first. Standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: « Ce ne sont là que les mesures préliminaires à l'interrogatoire en tant que tel, Votre Seigneurie. Un suspect est bien plus enclin à parler lorsqu'on prépare le terrain à coups de matraque. Nous ne faisons que suivre la procédure habituelle. »

languages.text: «Esas son solo las medidas preliminares antes de empezar el interrogatorio real, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Los sospechosos están más dispuestos a confesar después de un poco de jarabe de palo. Procedimiento estándar».
languages.original_text: "Those are merely the preliminary measures before the interrogation begins in earnest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A suspect becomes more inclined to speak if you give them the baton first. Standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: «Esas son solo las medidas preliminares antes de empezar el interrogatorio real, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Los sospechosos están más dispuestos a confesar después de un poco de jarabe de palo. Procedimiento estándar».

languages.text: “这些仅仅是审讯正式开始之前的准备措施，大人。先用警棍揍他们一顿，他们会更容易开口，这是标准程序。”
languages.original_text: "Those are merely the preliminary measures before the interrogation begins in earnest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A suspect becomes more inclined to speak if you give them the baton first. Standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: “这些仅仅是审讯正式开始之前的准备措施，大人。先用警棍揍他们一顿，他们会更容易开口，这是标准程序。”

languages.text: 「陛下、これは尋問が本格的に始まる前の予備措置にすぎません。最初にバトンを渡すと、容疑者は話してくれやすくなるんです。まぁ、簡単なテクニックです」
languages.original_text: "Those are merely the preliminary measures before the interrogation begins in earnest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A suspect becomes more inclined to speak if you give them the baton first. Standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、これは尋問が本格的に始まる前の予備措置にすぎません。最初にバトンを渡すと、容疑者は話してくれやすくなるんです。まぁ、簡単なテクニックです」

languages.text: "Das sind lediglich die vorbereitenden Maßnahmen, ehe das eigentliche Verhör beginnt, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Verdächtige sind eher bereit zu reden, wenn man sie vorher mit dem Schlagstock bearbeitet. Das ist die übliche Vorgehensweise."
languages.original_text: "Those are merely the preliminary measures before the interrogation begins in earnest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A suspect becomes more inclined to speak if you give them the baton first. Standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: "Das sind lediglich die vorbereitenden Maßnahmen, ehe das eigentliche Verhör beginnt, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Verdächtige sind eher bereit zu reden, wenn man sie vorher mit dem Schlagstock bearbeitet. Das ist die übliche Vorgehensweise."

languages.text: "Sorgu tam anlamıyla başlamadan önce tedbir amacıyla yaptığımız bir şey bu {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Şüpheliler, önden copla tanıştıklarında konuşmaya daha çok eğilim gösterir. Standart prosedür bu şekilde."
languages.original_text: "Those are merely the preliminary measures before the interrogation begins in earnest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A suspect becomes more inclined to speak if you give them the baton first. Standard procedure."
